title: Exodus '95
description: Claire, a young graphic designer, learns a secret that her dying New York neighbor has kept for twenty years: the whereabouts of Mosesâ€™ Biblical staff.Claire needs the help of an Israeli engineer and the money of a Russian oligarch to recover the staff before her body betrays her. But first she needs to stay alive in a race with fanatics, who will do anything to keep the staff from coming to light.Then the LORD said to Moses: Raise your staff and stretch out your hand over the sea to divide the water so that the Israelites can go through the sea on dry ground.
author: Kfir Luzzatto
